subject.normal: [Webkit-unassigned] [Bug 49468] [Qt] Assertion failure in DocumentLoader::commitData when loading a media document

body.para:
--- Comment #13 from Alexis Menard <alexis.menard@openbossa.org> 2011-05-27
05:30:31 PST --- (From update of attachment 94838) View in context: https://bugs.webkit.org/attachment.cgi?id=94838&action=review

quote.quotepara: This doesn't seem right. Why do only we need this but not the other ports?

I suggest to do a build of another port (Gtk for example) and try to see where
the history item is cleared in the other ports. Note that
http://trac.webkit.org/changeset/51104 also changes shouldFallBack(). Either way
I think we should forward-port 51104 to WebKit/qt.

body.para:
Sounds like a hack to me. Why we have duplicates in the stack in the first
place?
